title: my account got hacked
body: So my friend send me an link that says put ur password and username to get free rp i thought it was riot at the start because the page and every thing was the same but then he told me it was scamed and now its 2 late for me they changed my password i need help please

replies.body:
It sounds that you may have fallen victim to a [phishing scam](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account).  No worries, use our [account recovery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694-Recovering-Your-Account) guide to regain access to your account.  If you still can't regain control, reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our account team will help out.  We'll respond as soon as we can!  

Also, hopefully your friend has secured his account as well, and stopped that from spreading!
